description: The notorious FIN7 hacking group has been spotted selling its custom "AvNeutralizer" tool, used to evade detection by killing enterprise endpoint protection software on corporate networks. [...]
title: Notorious FIN7 hackers sell EDR killer to other threat actors

description: Microsoft is rolling out inbound SMTP DANE with DNSSEC for Exchange Online in public preview, a new capability to boost email integrity and security. [...]
title: Exchange Online adds Inbound DANE with DNSSEC for security boost

description: Cisco has fixed a maximum severity vulnerability that allows attackers to change any user's password on vulnerable Cisco Smart Software Manager On-Prem (Cisco SSM On-Prem) license servers, including administrators. [...]
title: Cisco SSM On-Prem bug lets hackers change any user's password

description: A threat actor has leaked a database containing the personal information of 442,519 Life360 customers collected by abusing a flaw in the login API. [...]
title: Over 400,000 Life360 user phone numbers leaked via unsecured API

description: MarineMax, self-described as the world's largest recreational boat and yacht retailer, is notifying over 123,000 customers whose personal information was stolen in a March security breach claimed by the Rhysida ransomware gang. [...]
title: Yacht giant MarineMax data breach impacts 123,000 individuals

description: While SaaS tools are a boon for worker productivity, they introduce complexity when it comes to IT audits and compliance. Learn more from Nudge Security about automating user access reviews to simplify this process. [...]
title: 5 steps to automate user access reviews and simplify IT compliance
